message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal for you, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $95. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $102.50.  This still gives you a good deal, and it's the best I can do.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to reach $102.50. I would like to propose $98. I hope this meets somewhere in between our positions.
